Host the wedding in a natural setting, such as a park or beach, to minimize the carbon footprint of the event.
Choose eco-friendly wedding decorations, such as recycled paper or biodegradable flowers.
Opt for locally sourced and organic food and drinks to reduce the carbon emissions associated with transportation.
Encourage guests to carpool or use public transportation to the wedding to reduce emissions.
Consider using a wedding planner who specializes in eco-friendly weddings to help plan and execute the event.
